paper_abstract: In this paper we consider ball packings in -dimensional hyperbolic space. We show that it is possible to exceed the conjectured -dimensional realizable packing density upper bound due to L. Fejes-Tth (Regular Figures, Macmillian, New York, 1964). We give seven examples of horoball packing configurations that yield higher densities of , where horoballs are centered at ideal vertices of certain Coxeter simplices, and are invariant under the actions of their respective Coxeter groups.
paper_title: New Lower Bound for the Optimal Ball Packing Density in Hyperbolic 4-Space
